lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
Similar to many other people I am no longer making loans at this time, because of the issue of Kiva's policy with respect to loans which support cockfighting. 

I am hopeful though that through discussion, debate, and public feedback the issue will be in a more consistent state. 

My work on this issue can be found at the following pages: 

http://www.dkfriedman.name/kiva_cockfighting_loans.php

and:

http://kaclwiki.org/
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a teacher and also as a computer programmer.

lenders.name: Rowan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference

lenders.name: Nathaniel
lenders.occupational_info: Casino Walk gives you a taste of the casino life by walking you through the different casino games. Many people put their focus only on poker games, but there is so much more to the casinos than just poker tables and poker hands, and so we here at Casino Walk want to give you that. Different games are tackled – from the source of majority of the income of casinos, the slot machines, to the table games, and other card games that are played inside casinos. Information on how these games work and on how you can make the most out of your playing experience is also given so that you can enjoy your next trip to the casino.

lenders.name: Mattias
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Katja

lenders.name: HGT 10b
lenders.loan_because:
We loan because it’s a great matter to encourage a person who usually does not have the chance to change their life on their own.
These people who apply for a credit are often families with children, who can’t go to school, have not enough to eat or to drink and live in slums. We hope to help them to get out of their bad situation and start a new life.We like the idea of support to self-help. And we think it’s ignorant and just not right to say “it’s not my problem so who cares?”

lenders.name: MARTIN
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help others willing to work so hard to survive. The least I could do is help a bit.

lenders.name: Clea
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Kiva and micro-finance for women and the ability to assist families in developing countries and their greater communities. I also believe in sponsoring entrepreneurialism no matter how small the endeavour!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a personal trainer and health coach based in Sydney, Australia. I am the founder and owner of Goddess Fitness Online.

lenders.name: Ernesto
lenders.loan_because: because I have to add more computer units that can accommodate more web marketing projects and additional staff (working students) to work as part or full-timers.
lenders.occupational_info: The nature of our business involves marketing websites and social promotions to drive traffic to that particular site we are promoting. 10% of the proceeds goes to "Adopt a School Program" to help upgrade facilities of old public schools.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.occupation: I am a mommy of three
lenders.loan_because: becuase I know some day I will need help
lenders.occupational_info: I am  just able to help as much as I can.

lenders.name: Masaya
lenders.loan_because: Everybody has right to enjoy his/her life.   I am glad to make any contribution to them.    It's just one world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am Customer Support professional in global IT,

lenders.loan_because: This appears to be one of the best ways to help others to help themselves. Together we can then build a better world.

lenders.occupational_info: I've been a teacher for the last 10 years.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: Someone once loaned money to me.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.  I appreciate what I have and am thankful for it.
lenders.occupational_info: Professionally, I'm supervisior of Desktop Computer Support for headquarters at a public company. I provide over 600 users in 3 local offices a level of support  that it has rewarded me a degree of respect and satisfaction that makes work a pleasure.   Personally, I've rebounded well from a few life changing events that have given me a different perspective on life and my place in it.

lenders.occupational_info: D2-PC levert Computer reparatie,onderhoud en systeembeheer voor consumenten en MKB

lenders.name: Pennevolent Planners
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are fortunate enough to be allowed to pursue our dreams and we would like to give others a chance to improve their lives as well.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a diverse group but have a common goal of helping others find success and better their lives.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of offering assistance in a way that works best for me.

lenders.name: Athience admin
lenders.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to live in Australia, and I'd like to share with those who aren't. Also, I have kids and I would like to give them the opportunity to understand that there are people in the world who don't have everything.

lenders.name: babydee
lenders.loan_because: I am a small business owner / entrepreneur, a woman focused on supporting her family while also striving to realize personal goals... All with many extraneous circumstances and obstacles to overcome...  So I get the struggle - but at the same time, realize how lucky I am, and wish to help those less fortunate than myself; Those who share the same goals and are motivated enough to put forth the effort needed to realize them!
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small, focused virtual design studio with a team of associates; We design and develop marketing materials in form of printed goods, websites and web-based applications, interactive presentations, and various multimedia content.  As a sideline project, I also sell digital vintage knitting and crochet patterns online - it is with a portion of these proceeds that I plan to fund KIVA loans.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I like to help creative people in other countries

lenders.occupational_info: Mama mia! Casino slots machine is fantastic because it made me rich, very rich. I know you don't realy believe me but....
